Package alix.lucene.search

Class Doc

java.lang.Object
alix.lucene.search.Doc
public class Doc
extends java.lang.Object
Tools to display a document

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Doc​(Alix alix, int docId)
    Get a document by lucene docId (persists as long as the Lucene index is not modified) with all fields loaded (even the big ones).
    Doc​(Alix alix, int docId, java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> fieldsToLoad)
    Get a document by lucene docId (persists as long as the Lucene index is not modified) with the set of fields provided (or all fields fieldsToLoad is null).
    Doc​(Alix alix, java.lang.String id)
    Get a document by String id (persists as long as the source XML doc is not modified) with all fields loaded (even the big ones).
    Doc​(Alix alix, java.lang.String id, java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> fieldsToLoad)
    Get a document by String id (persists as long as the source XML doc is not modified), with the set of fields provided (or all fields fieldsToLoad is null).
